sentences.sContent: We are speeding up the mechanization of our agriculture.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are speeding up the mechanization of our agriculture.
sentences.sCn: 我们正在加快农业机械化的步伐。

sentences.sContent: The fundamental way out for agriculture lies in mechanization.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fundamental way out for agriculture lies in mechanization.
sentences.sCn: 农业的根本出路在于机械化。

sentences.sContent: A: The most common for all of us is probably the mechanization and heavy dependency on technology.
sentences.sContent_eng: A: The most common for all of us is probably the mechanization and heavy dependency on technology.
sentences.sCn: 解答：最常见的可能就是机械化带来的一些结果和我们对于科技的过度依赖。

phrases.pCn: 系统机械化；全盘机械化

words.tran: 机械的；力学的；呆板的；无意识的；手工操作的
